snippet.title: Play Yakuza: Like a Dragon TODAY with Xbox Game Pass – Xbox & Bethesda Games Showcase 2021
snippet.description:
Play Yakuza: Like A Dragon today on console, PC, and cloud with Xbox Game Pass.

https://www.xbox.com/games/yakuza-like-a-dragon

Play Yakuza: Like A Dragon now with Xbox Game Pass. Become Ichiban Kasuga, a low-ranking yakuza grunt left on the brink of death by the man he trusted most. Take up your legendary bat and get ready to crack some underworld skulls in dynamic RPG combat set against the backdrop of modern-day Japan.

Subscribe to Xbox 🎮 https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR
 
Follow Xbox on other channels:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Xbox
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/Xbox
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Xbox

Follow Xbox Game Pass:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/XboxGamePass
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/xboxgamepass

Follow Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and SEGA:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rggstudio
https://www.twitter.com/sega
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sega/

AUDIO DESCRIPTION: https://youtu.be/gAOnJP1HTdU
